Package org.jgentleframework.core.handling

Interface Summary
AnnotationRegister Provides some methods in order to manage registered annotations and their validators (AnnotationValidator).
DefinitionManager DefinitionManager is responsible for Definition management.
IAbstractDefinitionExceptionCatcher The Interface IAbstractDefinitionExceptionCatcher.
 

Class Summary
AbstractDefinitionController Quản lý các phương thức điều khiển các module là các extension-point trong khi thực thi xử lý annotation, bao gồm việc diễn dịch annotation thành AnnoMeta, quản lý DefinitionPostProcessor, AnnotationBeanProcessor, ...
AbstractDefinitionExceptionCatcher Quản lý các phương thức xử lý catch exception trong khi thực thi validate các annotation.
AnnotatedWithDefHandling Class validator này được implements từ interface AnnotationValidator thực thi việc validate cho annotation AnnotatedWith.
AnnotatedWithValueDefHandling This class is an implementation of AnnotationValidator interface.
AnnotationRegisterImpl An implementation if AnnotationRegister interface.
DefinitionManagerImpl An implementation of DefinitionManager
MustBeExtendedByDefHandling This class is an implementation of AnnotationValidator interface.
MustBeImplementedByDefHandling This class is an implementation of AnnotationValidator interface.
UniqueDefHandling This is an implementation of AnnotationValidator interface in order to validate an annotation is unique corresponding to target element annotated with Unique annotation.
